content.text: You too! I'm a parent who feels like a failure, but I'm trying to make things better by taking care of my cat.
Oh that's tough. I'm not close to my family, but I'm working on it.
I have a close relationship with my family and enjoy sharing my memories and seashells with them.
That's great! I'm going to enjoy my weekend without any kids around. How about you?
I'm working, but I'm looking forward to spending time with my dog and listening to Bach.
That sounds nice! I love dogs. I wish I had one.
You're welcome to come over and visit!
Thanks for the offer! I might take you up on that.
Sounds good! I'm always happy to meet new people.
Me too! I'm glad we met.
Me too! Have a great weekend!
